The video was published on Facebook on A: 2020, with a caption claiming that Jacinda Ardern visited a Hindu temple after 100 days of no COVID-19 cases in New Zealand.
The video was shared multiple times on F: 3. Keyword and reverse image searches confirmed that the footage showed Ardern visiting the Hindu temple in Auckland on August 6, 2020, two days before the claim of 100 days without COVID-19 cases.
Indian Newslink and Radio Tarana: two Indian community media outlets in New Zealand, published livestreams, photo albums, and photos from the event where Ardern spoke at the temple, confirming her visit.
